data.text: @aevisualz Hi, sometimes the operation of our website may be affected, we suggest you delete cookies, browsing history, and change your browser or carry out the procedure from another computer or device. If the problem persists, write us again. Regards.
@Cahaber Hi, in order to assist you, please provide s with more information about your request by DM. We will stay tuned.
@PseudoAdult In order to assist you, please provide us with further details about your request by DM. We will stay tuned.
@vaquita913 Hello, thank you for contacting us. Please let us know via DM if you have any specific request or requirement to be able to assist you. We will stay tuned.

@MaikoAlmeida5 Hola, te hemos enviado respuesta vía DM. Saludos.

urls.title: Self-service and Contact Center | LATAM Airlines
urls.description: Here you will find the answer to the most frequent questions. You can communicate with us on our WhatsApp number or call us if you still have any questions and we will do our best to help you.

data.text: @minoi Bear in mind the multi-destination tickets bought through our website will only be available in the Basic fare. Therefore, you would have to add baggage and seats separately, or you can call our contact center:https://t.co/nvyjUWPaZR for a Top quote.

@aprendizUSA Hello, in order to assist you with your request, please provide us via Inbox with the reservation code (6 letters) or ticket number (13 digits) and the passenger's full name. We will be waiting for your reply.
@karenwelcy Hello, we sent you a request via DM. Regards.
@MaikoAlmeida5 Hello, we have replied to you via DM. Regards.
@eumesmojorg Oi, @eumesmojorg Acreditamos que isso pode ser um sinal de que você encontrará o amor em um de nossos voos. 😳 ✈️

@MacarenaJohns Hello, we have sent you a response via DM. Regards.

@ZarinHerbalife Hi, the disembarkation at the Chilean airport of foreign passengers connecting with other countries (stopovers) will be accepted without a medical certificate or questionnaire, as long as they remain in the connection zone and the stopover does not exceed 24 hours. Regards.
@kyleira1 Hi, we've sent you a DM. Regards.
@GmsKlv Hi, we've sent you a DM. regards.

@daniellobinho10 We have verified that your case is being worked on by the area in charge. It is due to the large amount of requests that the resolution time has been extended. We have updated the case with your comments. As soon as we have an answer for you, we will let you know through email.
@daniellobinho10 Hello, please let us know via DM if you have any specific request or requirement to be able to assist you. Regards.
@LeandroTaub Hello, we have sent you a response via DM. Regards.
@minoi Hola, para una mejor asistencia en que idioma desea ser atendido en ingles o español. Saludos.

data.text: #AttentionPassengers: Please remember that non-resident foreigners, independent of their age, can only enter Chile if their vaccination scheme is validated (Mobility Pass) in addition to all other entry requirements (negative PCR, health insurance, and C19). (1/2)👇 https://t.co/Oz0qdUe7rn

data.text: During Pink October, we continue giving wings to Tattoo Truck Tour 💪💕 by taking its art to Lima, Peru, and inspire more women who underwent a mastectomy to feel empowered in their bodies again. Learn all about this new story! #SelfEsteemDestination 💖 https://t.co/OoIIp2kjXK
@Travelport ✈️ 💙 ❤️

data.text: In October, we celebrate the work done by Tattoo Truck Tour, making their unique art fly to more destinations in the region. 💪💕 We want to share with you the story of these strong women from São Paulo, Brazil, who spread their wings to reach a #SelfEsteemDestination🎗💖 https://t.co/dinBMCi8po
@Lil_Caroline Hi, we have sent you a private message. Regards.

We reinforce our commitment to the planet by working with the @fcataruben and @pantheracats on the CO2BIO project. This sustainable initiative seeks to develop social, environmental and economic co-benefits through natural solutions. To be more sustainable is #WhatMakesUsFly https://t.co/AE3QnohzBd

Purchasing your trip at LATAM is much easier now! Enjoy this new digital experience by going to https://t.co/pxuBw92ejV. Then, you'll have access to customized notifications, more means of payment, automatic Check-in, and more. We want to connect you faster with #WhatMakesYouFly https://t.co/MFaXrY5sxo

data.text: Our global leader for diversity and inclusion, Marta, joined us in #PinkOctober to bring more hope and self-esteem to South America and the world. 🎗💖 Together, we will also carry out a very special project to fly higher. 💪💕 See the message we prepared! #SelfEsteemDestination https://t.co/hLWtyEOirW

@laurhines Hi Laura, have in mind that the data stored in the browser might affect the performance of our web, so please delete your history, cookies, and cache, and try again. If you keep having issues, please DM us a screenshot of the error.

We want to support and inspire women to recover confidence in their bodies to continue feeling empowered and beautiful so that we can reach together Self-Esteem Destination 💪💕. We also want to reinforce the importance of the self-exam for breast cancer early detection. 🎗💖 https://t.co/DNuO1GbX5z

@Kleiton_Silva Hello, due to the high demand for calls, the response time is being longer than usual. If you wish by this means we can provide assistance. Regards.
@AbnRnger Your comments make us happy. We hope to see you on board soon. Regards.
